text: Danger Mouse may refer to: * Danger Mouse (1981 TV series), a 1981 British animated television series * Danger Mouse (2015 TV series), a 2015 continuation of the British animated television series * Danger Mouse (musician) (born 1977), American musician, DJ and producer * DangerMouse, the nickname of David Morgan-Mar, an Australian physicist and webcomic creator
title: Danger Mouse
